MapleM.full_text:
A Crystal saved is a Crystal earned, Maplers! Select packages in the Shop contain Crystal Bonus Coupons!

Coupons can save you between 5-30% off your next purchase! Coupons you have will automatically apply to your next Crystal purchase within 3 days of obtaining it! https://t.co/R1IkcOsHIW

Maple.full_text: A reminder that today's weather is a sunny one in Maple! Don't miss out on the perks for logging in today: https://t.co/7TybO0ZD4K https://t.co/LzWCA1vc5O
